text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Department" means the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.
"Education loan" means any loan that is obtained for tuition, educational expenses, or living expenses for undergraduate or graduate study leading to practice as a physician.
"Fund" means the Maryland Loan Assistance Repayment Program Fund.
"Program" means the Maryland Loan Assistance Repayment Program for Physicians.
